trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> événement se produit lorsqu’un panneau des balises actives est affiché ou masqué.

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: Cet événement n’est pas généré directement par le panneau de configuration, mais plutôt par le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> classe lorsque son <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> et <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> méthodes sont exécutées.

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Valeur qui spécifie si le panneau est affiché ou masqué.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Pour le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> événement, le `relatedObject` paramètre fait toujours référence à la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> que le panneau est associé.

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Obtient un indicateur signalant si le panneau des balises actives est affiché ou masqué.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType" /> that indicates the state of the panel.

If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>.
trans-unit.target: Si le panneau est masqué via un appel à la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> (méthode), cette propriété a la valeur <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide>.

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>.
trans-unit.target: Si le panneau est affiché via un appel à <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, cette propriété a la valeur <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l'objet associé au panneau des balises actives.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associé au panneau des balises actives.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> propriété permet au programmeur d’associer un objet à une instance de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> classe.

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: Cet objet est ensuite accessible aux méthodes qui gèrent la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> événement.
